rows.label: qst702001_msg0001
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0002
rows.name:
What should I do...? I
can't just leave now...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0003
rows.name: What is it, Mars? Is something wrong?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0004
rows.name: Adel-sama!

rows.label: qst702001_msg0005
rows.name: No, it's just that...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0006
rows.name: Ah, nothing's wrong!

rows.label: qst702001_msg0007
rows.name:
You were just muttering to yourself
as if there was a problem.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0008
rows.name:
I can't hide anything from
you, can I, Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0009
rows.name:
I was worried I would trouble
you if I told you...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0010
rows.name:
Don't worry about that.
Please, tell me.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0011
rows.name: Well, the truth is...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0012
rows.name: I left my wife and children in Gula.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0013
rows.name:
But I've heard that Gula has become
a dangerous place recently...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0014
rows.name:
I'm worried, but I've been put
in charge of the Gulans here, so
I can't go and check on them.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0015
rows.name:
I believe you've visited
Gula, Adel-sama. How was it?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0017
rows.name:
Remnants of Shiya's forces have
been raiding villages. Some areas
were in a terrible state.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0018
rows.name:
If Aletta were in that state, I wouldn't
be able to rest easy either. It's natural
to worry about your family...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0019
rows.name:
I see... I hope Torigo
Village is safe...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0020
rows.name: Torigo Village...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0022
rows.name:
Adel... I'm going to
tell him the truth.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0023
rows.name: Torigo Village... has been abandoned.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0024
rows.name: No...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0025
rows.name: Kai...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0026
rows.name: Kei...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0027
rows.name: And Nelly... I'm sorry...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0028
rows.name: Did you say Kai and Kei?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0029
rows.name: Your son and daughter's names?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0030
rows.name:
Y-yes... But how did you
know, Adel-sama...?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0031
rows.name: I've met Kai and Kei.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0032
rows.name:
They are surely safe. They
were waiting for their
father to come for them.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0034
rows.name: Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0035
rows.name:
We will bring Kai and Kei to you.
Please wait here until then.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0036
rows.name: ...I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0037
rows.name:
So the father that Kai-kun
and Kei-chan were talking
about was Mars-san.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0038
rows.name:
They should be at the campsite
in Gula's Seigle Fell, right?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0039
rows.name: Yes. Let's hurry.
